projects.name: Doeasily, Business made easy
description: Implementing new features for customers to track their jewelry purchase and sale history.
Enhancing the codebase and elevating the user interface to optimize user experience.
Introducing table and tile views for ledger access, enabling customers to seamlessly review their purchase and sale records.
Establishing an onboarding procedure to facilitate a smooth initiation for new customers when they embark on using the application.
Implemented keyboard shortcuts for enhanced user interaction and efficiency.

projects.name: Bookee CRM
description: Developed responsive user interfaces using Angular framework for a CRM application, ensuring seamless user experience across multiple devices and browsers.
Collaborated with backend developers and designers to integrate frontend components with backend APIs, ensuring smooth data flow and system functionality.
Implemented complex UI features such as dynamic form validations, and data filtering to enhance the usability and effectiveness of the CRM application.
Designed and implemented a modular and scalable code structure, allowing for easy maintenance and future enhancements of the CRM application.
Actively participated in agile development processes, attending daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives to effectively deliver features within project timelines.

projects.name: Embed
description: Initiate REST APIs requests.
Manage form validation errors.
Resolve user interface anomalies.
Integrate innovative features such as introducing a referral system and enabling the addition of digital signatures on forms.

projects.name: InJOBS
description: Created landing page for InJOBS.

Created the InJOBS portal, a platform where jobseekers can discover job opportunities, research projects, freelance gigs, and internships. Additionally, MSMEs (Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises) and working professionals can post their own opportunities on the platform.
Created an admin panel for InJOBS portal - Admin can see the statistics and can see which candidates are under which Mentor.

projects.name: Acu 1st Insurance
description: Implemented responsive designs and mobile-first development principles, resulting in improved accessibility across devices.
Developed a robust CRM application for managing insurance policies, claims, and customer data using React, Redux, and Material-UI.
Implemented form validation and error handling to ensure accurate data entry and improve data integrity.
Integrated with RESTful APIs to fetch and update data from external systems, including underwriting systems and payment gateways.

projects.name: BOI Matrimony
description: Created the landing page.
Created the web portal for Brahmin Organization of India.
Implemented the chat feature.
Implemented secure user sign up and login.

projects.name: CLOUD COACH
description: Created a user interface with end-to-end functionality for an AI bot for automatic assessment and feedback that can be used for interviews, training like sales or leadership, course testing, screening, job simulation etc.
Implementing Open AI feature to leverage the power of application to provide the AI capabilities.

projects.name: Verzeo Web Development Course
description: I completed a comprehensive two-month online course centered on web development technologies, gaining proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, DOM manipulation, AJAX, and jQuery.
